name: Anginn
description:
Hello! This is my entry to the 2022 Funni Jam! The theme was "The game is your friend" So I've interpreted it in a way that you meet a friend who follows you through an exciting adventure! 

I'll be updating the game a LOT, so keep up with the new releases here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUp03OR0dTfDvv-u_0M0SaA
